channel.title: Investigations on Semidigital Meta Adventures
channel.description: Recent content in Investigations on Semidigital Meta Adventures

item.title: Infrastructure
item.description: Software and services that help instead of getting in the way One of the things that crops up again and again is that computers do what you told them to, not what you meant. SO ANNOYING

item.title: Boneless
item.description:
A gateware CPU

The Boneless-CPU is a soft CPU written in nmigen by Whitequark.

It is a 16bit Von Neumann machine with a completely flat memory space , registers and all. The gateware is nice and compact and fits into about 500 LUTS plus memory.

item.title: CQparts
item.description: Build tangible programmatic designs in python. It is similar in form to OpenScad where you can define 3d objects with code, however it is python and brings all the power of OO to building objects. You can make paramteric object that are an assembly of parts, this is one of my examples for a little project box [] (https://cqparts.github.io/examples/export/showcase/ProjectBox/) It can also generate gltf format files and display them with ThreeJS
